text:
January 28, 1958
Dr. Harry Skoroia
Executive Director
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Enclosed you will find the rough
draft of the fund request which you
wanted returned. I certainly appreciated
the opportunity to look it over.
Best of luck with It In Hew York.
Sincerely,
SLB:mw
Enel.
Sam L. Becker
Director, Division of
Televlslon~Badlo-Fllia
